thread.title: Australian court revokes environmental approval for Adani's Carmichael coal mine
thread.title_full: Australian court revokes environmental approval for Adani's Carmichael coal mine

title: Australian court revokes environmental approval for Adani's Carmichael coal mine
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Aug 5, 2015, 03:02 BST - UK Markets open in 4 hrs 58 mins Australian court revokes environmental approval for Adani's Carmichael coal mine Reuters – 1 hour 10 minutes ago Print 
SYDNEY (Reuters) - Australia's Federal court on Wednesday overturned government environmental approval for the Carmichael coal mine under construction in the Australian outback by Indian conglomerate Adani Mining (ADEL.NS). 
Environmentalists hailed the ruling against the $16 billion project as a victory in their efforts to block the mine, which they claimed put the Great Barrier Reef under threat.
